meanings.definition: A dish of meat, typically beef, cooked slowly in beer with onions and herbs.
meanings.sent1: The carbonade was simmering in the pot, filling the kitchen with a delicious aroma.
meanings.sent2: I ordered the carbonade at the restaurant, and it was tender and flavorful.
meanings.sent3: The carbonade told a joke to the vegetables in the stew, making them all laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter bubbled up like a pot of carbonade on the stove.
meanings.sent5: The rich flavors of the carbonade lingered on my taste buds long after the meal was over.

meanings.definition: A piece of meat, typically beef, cooked in this way.
meanings.sent1: The butcher wrapped the carbonade in brown paper for the customer.
meanings.sent2: She grilled the carbonade to perfection, making it juicy and tender.
meanings.sent3: The carbonade rolled off the plate and onto the floor, much to the dog's delight.
meanings.sent4: His words were as tough as a overcooked carbonade.
meanings.sent5: The sizzle of the carbonade on the grill was music to his ears.
